text:
"The Expendables 3" is a 2014 American ensemble action movie directed by Patrick Hughes. It is a sequel to the 2012 action movie The Expendables 2. It is also the third movie in The Expendables movie series.
Plot.
Barney adds to his team to get ready for a personal battle against Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader. Stonebanks wants to wipe out Barney and every single one of his associates.
Ratings.
At the 2014 Cannes Film Festival, Stallone announced that he was aiming for a PG-13 rating for the movie.
